Hot deploy works, but it does not unload the classes,even if you specify to jvm class unloading (-XX:CMSClassUnloadingEnabled) and -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSPermGenSweepingEnabled.
After some hot redeploys, tomcat jvm fails with PermGen Space error.
I tried to crank up the memory for permgen.. but this only allow you to make more redeploys until fail..
creator: radu.m.toader@gmail.com
radu.m.toader@gmail.com
text:
tomcat version  7.0.34
java version 7u45
i also tried with older version
tomcat version 7.0.47 
java 7u14
it does not matter the version, it will fail with permgen space.
